duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver large-scale, complex supply chain management and transformation projects, including designing, implementing, deploying, and evaluating supply chain management relevant business for performance improvement.
Work with client organizations to enhance supply chain performance through planning process and organization re-engineering.
Collaborate with a team to analyze client issues and develop solutions.
Prioritize objectives and contribute to project planning and status reporting.
Work with high-level client personnel to analyze, evaluate, and enhance specific functional areas within the specialized area of supply chain.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or master’s degree in supply chain, industrial engineering, or business
